original_title: La taglia è tua... l'uomo l'ammazzo io
overview: An alcoholic gunman, hunted down by five pitiless bounty hunters, is sheltered by a saloon dancer. When his enemies kill the girl the outlaw pulls himself together and faces his adversaries and takes his revenge in a final showdown. An interesting take on the reluctant gunfighter theme contains some truly surprising twists.
title: The Reward's Yours... The Man's Mine
